resources.string:
* 	 Click on + icon to add details of the device to be 
 	 	 tracked. 
* 	 After adding the device, click on "Request consent" 
 	 	 to obtain consent approval from the device owner. 
* 	 After consent approval is received from the device 
 	 	 owner over SMS, select the device from the list 
 	 	 and click on "Track" to start tracking.
